text: Same @KeithMcCullough Aug 22, 2022 | 04:24 PM EDT DOUG KASS Minding Mr. Market: Nasty Scar Tissue Remains We saw terrible performance in the market today, despite the smiling "talking heads" in the business media -- who conveniently forgot their optimism of a week ago!

Performance was similar, in fact, to Friday's. Make no mistake about it ... there is a lot of scar tissue in poorly performing portfolios -- which are again suffering. Into the whoosh lower, I reduced my short exposure today (with multiple short covers). @threadreaderapp unroll

@realmoney @dougkass @SeabreezeLP Aug 22, 2022 | 02:55 PM EDT DOUG KASS Speed Kills * Dealing with a new regime of heightened volatility... Amazingly, the S&P Index is now 200 handles lower than the highs of early last week. Remember this volatility and price "action":

* When you size your individual equity positions. * When you determine your portfolio's value at risk or "VAR." * When you evaluate the sources you call upon when making your investment and trading decisions. * When you evaluate the confidence of view of your sources you

call upon when making your investment and trading decisions. Also remember that: * Volatility in the up direction is not a problem - it's only downward volatility that offers discourse! @tomkeene @ferrotv @lisaabramowicz1 @jimcramer @michaelsantoli @riskreversal @guyadami
